conversations.conversation:
are junam baratun bege ke hamishe say konid mosbat andish bashid va karaei bokonid ke khosh begzare, man vaghti ye moshkeli baram pish miyad hamsishe in jomlaro migam ";tomorrow is a better day";
shomaham emtehan konid
smile all the time.
god bless us all
god is so kind not angry
peace.
